name: Young Griffon (Small)
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Keen Sight: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +1+1d4 - 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +1+1d4 - 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.
